name: Herb & Garlic Mashed Potatoes

ingredients.name: medium potatoes, such as Russet or Yukon Gold

preparation: In bowl, combine sour cream with dip mix. Set aside.
Peel potatoes; cut into 1" cubes. Place in Multipurpose Steamer.
Microwave on high, covered, for 15 min, stirring every 5 min.
Mash potatoes to desired consistency. Fold in dip, milk, butter, and salt, if desired.

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, parsley, & garlic.

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
